ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Mistmoore question....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Makes me think of the 6th lvl bard I saw in CB last week:  full lambant armor and asking my 20th lvl druid for a SOW.  I was amazed.
ygData.messageBody:
--- "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
wrote:

> P.S. While playing twinks is fun, its pretty funny
> to watch someone with a
> 50th warrior play a 19th cleric as they get to two
> bubbles of health..and we
> say: "Run, run, no really run, we're leaving you,
> run run, ok bye".....
> cleric dies.

Makes me think of the 6th lvl bard I saw in CB last
week: full lambant armor and asking my 20th lvl druid
for a SOW. I was amazed.
